The registration fees for the conference are outlined below:

- **Registration Fee will be published soon –

This registration fee covers:

- Publication of papers with IEEE
- Access to proceedings after the conference 
- Access to the videos of sessions after the conference.
- Use of conftool submissions systems to manage and process submissions
 
**[Registration for ICE 2022 will be available soon.](https://www.conftool.pro/ice-iamot-2022)**

Please Note: All authors must pay the whole conference fee, even if they want to join only for the day of their presentation.
